LanguageData.PH.AllowPlantGrowthInsideProxyHeatEffect: Allow plant growth inside proxy heat effect radius
LanguageData.VTE.MustPlaceHeaterWithFreeSpaces: The hot side of the heater must be exposed.
LanguageData.VTE.MustPlaceUnderRoof: Must be placed under a roof.
LanguageData.VTE.CannotPlaceAdjacentCeilingFan: Cannot be placed next to ceiling fans.
LanguageData.VTE.AcRelinkDescription: Link this AC unit with the system, inheriting the desired temperature.
LanguageData.VTE.AcUnlinkDescription: Unlink this AC unit from inheriting desired temperature from the system.
LanguageData.VTE.MissingCompressors: Cannot work: Not enough compressors connected.
LanguageData.VTE.MissingController: Cannot work: Missing AC control unit.
LanguageData.VTE.TooManyControllers: Cannot work: Connected to more than one AC control unit.
